DOC.detailed_description: A three-year , longitudinal , triangulation research method apply . First Year ( Phase I ) : A preliminary HBA exercise program , include hard copy description DVD demonstration exercise , mail 16 expert Delphi advisory panel critique evaluation . First Year ( Phase II ) : A quasi-experimental , one-group , pretest-posttest design use pilot-test feasibility HBA exercise program group 35 community-dwelling old adult community care station . Second Year : A cluster randomize control trial use test effect six-month , instructor-led HBA exercise program functional fitness ( cardiovascular-respiratory function , body flexibility , muscle strength , muscle endurance ) , perceive health status , sleep quality community-dwelling older adult . Through use convenience sample strategy , eight community care station approximately 240 old adult Kaohsiung recruit randomly assign base community care station HBA experimental group wait-list control group . Participants experimental group receive HBA exercise program lead trained certified instructor , three time per week , 40 minute per practice six month ; participant wait-list control group continue regular daily activity . One pre-test two post-tests , three month apart , conduct . Third Year : Using method second year , participant second year continue practice HBA exercise program , guide DVD , another six month . The feasibility , compliance , effectiveness DVD-led HBA exercise program community-dwelling older adult test , another two post-tests , three month apart , conduct outcome measurement second year .
